sections.heading: of manufacturers, distributors, wholesalers, and retailers of sparklers.
sections.text: of manufacturers, distributors, wholesalers, and retailers of sparklers.

sections.heading: of fireworks regulated; rules and regulations.
sections.text: of fireworks regulated; rules and regulations.

sections.heading: As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Distributor” means any person engaged in the business of selling sparklers to a wholesaler
sections.text: (2)“Division” means the Division of the State Fire Marshal of the Department of Financial Services.(3)“Explosive compound” means any chemical compound, mixture, or device

sections.heading: Any firm, copartnership, or corporation violating the provisions of this chapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor of the first degree, punishable as provided in s
sections.text: 775.083 or, in the case of individuals, the members of a partnership and the responsible officers and agents of an association or corpor
